title: sree raamam ravi kulaapthi
sahitya:
Sri Ramam Ravi kulaapthi somam
Srutha kalpabooruham bhajeham

anupallavi

Dheeraagrahanyam varenyam
dheena janaa dhaaram Raghuveeram
Naradhaadhi sannutha Ramayana paaraayana mudhitha Narayanam

caraNam

Dasarathaathmajam Lakshmanaagrajam
Daanava kula bheekaram sreekaram
Kucha Lava thaatham Seetho bedham
Kuvalaya nayanam Sudharbha sayanam
Suchara chapa banimshu dheemanim
sumrudha bhaasham Guruguha thosham
Dasa vadhana bhanchanam niranjanam
Dhaana nidhimdaya rasa jala nidhitham
